crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET POLICY [401TRG] DropBox Access via API (SNI)
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tls $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET POLICY [401TRG] DropBox Access via API (SNI)"; flow:established,to_server; tls.sni; content:"content.dropboxapi.com"; nocase; reference:url,github.com/dropbox/dbxcli; classtype:policy-violation; sid:2030702; rev:1; metadata:affected_product Windows_XP_Vista_7_8_10_Server_32_64_Bit, attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2020_08_19, deployment Perimeter, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2020_08_19;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET POLICY [401TRG] DropBox Access via API (Certificate)
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tls $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any (msg:"ET POLICY [401TRG] DropBox Access via API (Certificate)"; flow:established,from_server; tls.cert_subject; content:"CN=content.dropboxapi.com"; reference:url,github.com/dropbox/dbxcli; classtype:policy-violation; sid:2030703; rev:1; metadata:affected_product Windows_XP_Vista_7_8_10_Server_32_64_Bit, attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2020_08_19, deployment Perimeter, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2020_08_19;)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Usage Of Web Request Commands And Cmdlets - ScriptBlock
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the use of various web request commands with commandline tools and Windows PowerShell cmdlets (including aliases) via PowerShell scriptblock logs

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

attributes.magic: ASCII text, with CRLF line terminators
